Ingredients.1: 1 (5 ounce) can chunk light tuna in water

Ingredients.2: 4 teaspoons creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®)

Ingredients.7: 2 teaspoons white sugar, or more to taste

Ingredients.8: 0.5 teaspoon salt, or more to taste

Directions.1: Drain the tuna, reserving 1 tablespoon of the liquid.

Directions.2: Put the tuna in a serving bowl and mash with a fork until it's as mushy as you can get it. Stir the reserved liquid, the salad dressing, honey mustard, relish, celery, carrot, sugar, and salt into the tuna. Adjust seasoning to taste.
